## [v1.2.0](https://github.com/Edvinas01/ggj-2026/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0) - 2026-02-XX

### Added

- Destructible items.
- Boucne animation to intro screen.
- Juice to punches and picking up items.
- Bathroom with Bahtroom guy.
- Intro text to mention what is goin' on.

### Changed

- Start menu to have more juice.
- Controls helper to include controls for gamepad.

### Fixed

- Raycasts going through walls.
- Some lvl design jank.

## [v1.1.0](https://github.com/Edvinas01/ggj-2026/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0) - 2026-02-03

### Added

- Floating text above alko bottle shown when picking up items.
- Item grab animation.
- Added maroz footsteps.
- Credits to victory screen.
- Start screen to address audio issues.

### Changed

- Enabled vsync.
- Balancing of items.
- Added more people and guards.
- Improve pathfinding.

### Fixed

- Chat timer text keeping the old value.
- Tooltips bugging out and not showing.
- Curtains should not billboard.
- Fixed "Šeiminukės" rotation.
- Menu buttons not deselecting correctly when using mouse pointer.

## [v1.0.0](https://github.com/Edvinas01/ggj-2026/compare/v1.0.0) - 2026-02-03

Initial post Game Jam release.
